resources.contents:
openapi: 3.1.0
x-stoplight:
  id: tbwljsc6ixpvl
info:
  title: FinCheck
  version: '1'
  description: FinCheck is an mobile & web application that it goal is to help people in their own financial management and planning.
  contact:
    name: PatoGordo
    url: 'https://patogordo.dev'
    email: conversecomicaro@gmail.com
  termsOfService: 'https://fincheck.patogordo.dev/terms-of-service'
  license:
    name: MIT
    identifier: MIT
  summary: FinCheck API
servers:
  - url: 'https://dev-fincheck.patogordo.dev/api/v1'
    description: Development
  - url: 'https://fincheck.patogordo.dev/api/v1'
    description: Production
paths:
  /auth/sign-in:
    post:
      summary: Sign In
      operationId: Sign In
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      token: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoiYmQ2YmIxN2UtMzRkYi00NTU3LWI4YTQtOTkzY2NiYjBjMWEwIiwibGluayI6IlFVSFN6Q0pSOEJqeHQxWjFFcW9HekVFWSIsImlhdCI6MTY4OTU5MTkzNSwiZXhwIjoxNjg5NTk1NTM1fQ.6OlXMmJUub2eeZIqYlAiRzLK6h0WmPHp_45i8eY0Wkg
                      refresh_token: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJsaW5rIjoiUVVIU3pDSlI4Qmp4dDFaMUVxb0d6RUVZIiwiaWF0IjoxNjg5NTkxOTM1LCJleHAiOjE2ODk4NTExMzV9.j2yKH2EdaT6ZPH7cUwboyjmNPR0ZRrgqqDCfCJ2cJCM
                      user:
                        id: bd6bb17e-34db-4557-b8a4-993ccbb0c1a0
                        name: PatoGordo
                        email: me@patogordo.dev
                        password: protected-data
                        status: approved
                        role: user
                        created_at: '2023-07-17T11:05:35.315Z'
                        updated_at: '2023-07-17T11:05:35.315Z'
                        deleted: false
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      token:
                        type: string
                      refresh_token:
                        type: string
                      user:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                          name:
                            type: string
                          email:
                            type: string
                          password:
                            type: string
                          status:
                            enum:
                              - approved
                              - restricted
                          role:
                            enum:
                              - admin
                              - editor
                              - user
                          created_at:
                            type: string
                          updated_at:
                            type: string
                          deleted:
                            type: boolean
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      token: string
                      refresh_token: string
                      user:
                        id: string
                        name: string
                        email: string
                        password: protected-data
                        status: approved|restricted
                        role: user|editor|admin
                        created_at: string
                        updated_at: string
                        deleted: false
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      token:
                        type: string
                      refresh_token:
                        type: string
                      user:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                          name:
                            type: string
                          email:
                            type: string
                          password:
                            type: string
                          status:
                            enum:
                              - approved
                              - restricted
                          role:
                            enum:
                              - user
                              - editor
                              - admin
                          created_at:
                            type: string
                          updated_at:
                            type: string
                          deleted:
                            type: boolean
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    x-stoplight:
                      id: qsii8lzpvh3ak
                    example: Email or Password is incorrect!
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
                    x-stoplight:
                      id: c15t6trsiz1if
                    example: 400
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    x-stoplight:
                      id: invdgl5gv21iz
                    example: '2023-07-17T11:07:55.806Z'
                  path:
                    type: string
                    x-stoplight:
                      id: lu47retnir6d1
                    example: /v1/api/auth/sign-in
                  handled:
                    type: boolean
                    x-stoplight:
                      id: r7ukr52r432w3
                    default: true
      x-stoplight:
        id: dalo3z7blkym7
      description: With this endpoint you are able to login in the application and get a Bearer token to access other routes and operations
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                email:
                  type: string
                password:
                  type: string
              x-examples:
                Example 1:
                  email: string
                  password: string
        description: Sign In Example
      tags:
        - Authentication
  /auth/sign-up:
    post:
      summary: Sign Up
      operationId: Sign Up
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      token: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoiYmQ2YmIxN2UtMzRkYi00NTU3LWI4YTQtOTkzY2NiYjBjMWEwIiwibGluayI6IlFVSFN6Q0pSOEJqeHQxWjFFcW9HekVFWSIsImlhdCI6MTY4OTU5MTkzNSwiZXhwIjoxNjg5NTk1NTM1fQ.6OlXMmJUub2eeZIqYlAiRzLK6h0WmPHp_45i8eY0Wkg
                      refresh_token: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJsaW5rIjoiUVVIU3pDSlI4Qmp4dDFaMUVxb0d6RUVZIiwiaWF0IjoxNjg5NTkxOTM1LCJleHAiOjE2ODk4NTExMzV9.j2yKH2EdaT6ZPH7cUwboyjmNPR0ZRrgqqDCfCJ2cJCM
                      user:
                        id: bd6bb17e-34db-4557-b8a4-993ccbb0c1a0
                        name: PatoGordo
                        email: me@patogordo.dev
                        password: protected-data
                        status: approved
                        role: user
                        created_at: '2023-07-17T11:05:35.315Z'
                        updated_at: '2023-07-17T11:05:35.315Z'
                        deleted: false
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      token:
                        type: string
                      refresh_token:
                        type: string
                      user:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                          name:
                            type: string
                          email:
                            type: string
                          password:
                            type: string
                          status:
                            enum:
                              - approved
                              - restricted
                          role:
                            enum:
                              - admin
                              - editor
                              - user
                          created_at:
                            type: string
                          updated_at:
                            type: string
                          deleted:
                            type: boolean
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      token: string
                      refresh_token: string
                      user:
                        id: string
                        name: string
                        email: string
                        password: protected-data
                        status: approved|restricted
                        role: user|editor|admin
                        created_at: string
                        updated_at: string
                        deleted: false
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      token:
                        type: string
                      refresh_token:
                        type: string
                      user:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                          name:
                            type: string
                          email:
                            type: string
                          password:
                            type: string
                          status:
                            enum:
                              - approved
                              - restricted
                          role:
                            enum:
                              - user
                              - editor
                              - admin
                          created_at:
                            type: string
                          updated_at:
                            type: string
                          deleted:
                            type: boolean
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: Email already in use! Use another or login with this one.
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
                    example: 400
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    example: '2023-07-17T11:07:55.806Z'
                  path:
                    type: string
                    example: /v1/api/auth/sign-up
                  handled:
                    type: boolean
                    default: true
      description: With this endpoint you are able to register to the application and get an account to access other routes and operations
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              x-examples:
                Example 1:
                  email: string
                  password: string
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                  x-stoplight:
                    id: s8y14eznnd3m6
                email:
                  type: string
                password:
                  type: string
        description: Sign Up Example
      tags:
        - Authentication
      x-stoplight:
        id: 79bsnk5d1pjpz
    parameters: []
  /auth/sign-out:
    post:
      summary: Sign Out
      operationId: Sign Out
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties: {}
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result: {}
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      token: string
                      refresh_token: string
                      user:
                        id: string
                        name: string
                        email: string
                        password: protected-data
                        status: approved|restricted
                        role: user|editor|admin
                        created_at: string
                        updated_at: string
                        deleted: false
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      token:
                        type: string
                      refresh_token:
                        type: string
                      user:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                          name:
                            type: string
                          email:
                            type: string
                          password:
                            type: string
                          status:
                            enum:
                              - approved
                              - restricted
                          role:
                            enum:
                              - user
                              - editor
                              - admin
                          created_at:
                            type: string
                          updated_at:
                            type: string
                          deleted:
                            type: boolean
      description: With this endpoint you are able to sing out and end your session in the application.
      requestBody:
        content: {}
        description: Sign Up Example
      tags:
        - Authentication
      x-stoplight:
        id: uc1nq17lietrq
      parameters:
        - schema:
            type: string
          in: header
          name: Authorization
          description: <your_current_session_bearer_token>
    parameters: []
  /auth/forgot-password:
    post:
      summary: Forgot Password
      operationId: Forgot Password
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      message: An email containing a reset password link was sent to your email! Access it to reset your password.
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      message:
                        type: string
                        example: An email containing a reset password link was sent to your email! Access it to reset your password.
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      token: string
                      refresh_token: string
                      user:
                        id: string
                        name: string
                        email: string
                        password: protected-data
                        status: approved|restricted
                        role: user|editor|admin
                        created_at: string
                        updated_at: string
                        deleted: false
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      token:
                        type: string
                      refresh_token:
                        type: string
                      user:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                          name:
                            type: string
                          email:
                            type: string
                          password:
                            type: string
                          status:
                            enum:
                              - approved
                              - restricted
                          role:
                            enum:
                              - user
                              - editor
                              - admin
                          created_at:
                            type: string
                          updated_at:
                            type: string
                          deleted:
                            type: boolean
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: This email isn't registered in the app.
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
                    example: 400
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    example: '2023-07-17T11:07:55.806Z'
                  path:
                    type: string
                    example: /v1/api/auth/forgot-password
                  handled:
                    type: boolean
                    default: true
      description: With this endpoint you are able to get a password reset email
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              x-examples:
                Example 1:
                  email: string
                  password: string
              properties:
                email:
                  type: string
        description: Forgot Password Example
      tags:
        - Authentication
      x-stoplight:
        id: 500agkbb58rtv
    parameters: []
  /auth/reset-password:
    patch:
      summary: Reset Password
      operationId: Reset Password
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      message: An email containing a reset password link was sent to your email! Access it to reset your password.
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      message:
                        type: string
                        example: Password has been successfully reseted! You can login now with this new password.
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      token: string
                      refresh_token: string
                      user:
                        id: string
                        name: string
                        email: string
                        password: protected-data
                        status: approved|restricted
                        role: user|editor|admin
                        created_at: string
                        updated_at: string
                        deleted: false
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      token:
                        type: string
                      refresh_token:
                        type: string
                      user:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                          name:
                            type: string
                          email:
                            type: string
                          password:
                            type: string
                          status:
                            enum:
                              - approved
                              - restricted
                          role:
                            enum:
                              - user
                              - editor
                              - admin
                          created_at:
                            type: string
                          updated_at:
                            type: string
                          deleted:
                            type: boolean
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: 'Reset password link propabily is invalid, expired or already used!'
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
                    example: 400
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    example: '2023-07-17T11:07:55.806Z'
                  path:
                    type: string
                    example: /v1/api/auth/reset-password
                  handled:
                    type: boolean
                    default: true
      description: With this endpoint you are able to reset your password using a token that was sent to your emails
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              x-examples:
                Example 1:
                  email: string
                  password: string
              properties:
                token:
                  type: string
                  x-stoplight:
                    id: m27gprl9j2bez
                new_password:
                  type: string
                  x-stoplight:
                    id: 237a0vmgvy6xp
        description: Reset Password Example
      tags:
        - Authentication
      x-stoplight:
        id: lp1mhxhwa6esk
    parameters: []
  /auth/change-password:
    patch:
      summary: Change Password
      operationId: Change Password
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      message: An email containing a reset password link was sent to your email! Access it to reset your password.
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      message:
                        type: string
                        example: Your password was successfully changed!
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      token: string
                      refresh_token: string
                      user:
                        id: string
                        name: string
                        email: string
                        password: protected-data
                        status: approved|restricted
                        role: user|editor|admin
                        created_at: string
                        updated_at: string
                        deleted: false
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      token:
                        type: string
                      refresh_token:
                        type: string
                      user:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                          name:
                            type: string
                          email:
                            type: string
                          password:
                            type: string
                          status:
                            enum:
                              - approved
                              - restricted
                          role:
                            enum:
                              - user
                              - editor
                              - admin
                          created_at:
                            type: string
                          updated_at:
                            type: string
                          deleted:
                            type: boolean
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    example: Your current password does not meet with the sent one in the request!
                  status_code:
                    type: integer
                    example: 400
                  timestamp:
                    type: string
                    example: '2023-07-17T11:07:55.806Z'
                  path:
                    type: string
                    example: /v1/api/auth/change-password
                  handled:
                    type: boolean
                    default: true
      description: |-
        With this endpoint you are able to reset your password using the old one, you should to be logged-in to do this

        Before you reset your password, an email will be sent warning that change, it email has an revert action link.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              x-examples:
                Example 1:
                  email: string
                  password: string
              properties:
                old_password:
                  type: string
                  x-stoplight:
                    id: winnschtsncqd
                new_password:
                  type: string
        description: Reset Password Example
      tags:
        - Authentication
      x-stoplight:
        id: 9svrcaql2dqex
      parameters:
        - schema:
            type: string
          in: header
          name: Authorization
          description: Bearer <your_token>
    parameters: []
  /auth/revert-password-change:
    patch:
      summary: Revert Password Change
      operationId: Revert Password Change
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      message: An email containing a reset password link was sent to your email! Access it to reset your password.
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      message:
                        type: string
                        example: '"Password changed, successfully reverted! Please login and change your password to stay secure.'
            application/xml:
              schema:
                type: object
                x-examples:
                  Example 1:
                    result:
                      token: string
                      refresh_token: string
                      user:
                        id: string
                        name: string
                        email: string
                        password: protected-data
                        status: approved|restricted
                        role: user|editor|admin
                        created_at: string
                        updated_at: string
                        deleted: false
                properties:
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      token:
                        type: string
                      refresh_token:
                        type: string
                      user:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                          name:
                            type: string
                          email:
                            type: string
                          password:
                            type: string
                          status:
                            enum:
                              - approved
                              - restricted
                          role:
                            enum:
                              - user
                              - editor
                              - admin
                          created_at:
                            type: string
                          updated_at:
                            type: string
                          deleted:
                            type: boolean
      description: With this end point you are able to revert any password changes that occours in your account.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              x-examples:
                Example 1:
                  email: string
                  password: string
              properties:
                token:
                  type: string
                  x-stoplight:
                    id: ty6k8ollftqvy
        description: 'Revert Password Change Example '
      tags:
        - Authentication
      parameters: []
      x-stoplight:
        id: bdtsf1k8r8nh1
    parameters: []
components:
  schemas: {}
  securitySchemes: {}
x-internal: false
